      static java.util.ArrayList<Order> Query.ConfirmClient​(java.lang.String msg)
      This method selects all of the orders for the specific customer that have the status sent in the DB
      static java.util.ArrayList<Order> Query.LoadOrders​(java.lang.String restName)  
      Methods in querys with parameters of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String Query.checkRefund​(Order msg)
      The method checks if the costumer deserves to get a refund due to delays of order supply and also updates the refund that the customer deserves in the refund table- if he has no refund for the specific restaurant it will create one, otherwise-calculate the new amount of the refund
      static java.lang.String Query.getRefundSum​(Order order)
      This method gets the amount of the refund for the specific customer and restaurant- if there's no refund-returns null
      static java.lang.Integer Query.insertOrder​(Order msg)
      The method inserts the order of the customer to the order's table in the DB
      static java.lang.String Query.LoadPhoneNumber​(Order order)
      Method for obtaining the telephone number of the customer who placed the order.
      static boolean Query.updateBudgetValue​(Order order)
      Method for updating the Budget value in the database.
      static boolean Query.updateOrderStatusSended​(Order order)
      Method to update order status to - Sended.
      static boolean Query.updateOrderStatusToApproved​(Order order)
      Method for updating order status to - Approved
      static boolean Query.updateOrderStatusToNotApproved​(Order order)

      static boolean Query.updateRefundAmmount​(Order order)
